Response.Say: You've reached the Staff Maverick Job Seeker Line. Please apply for jobs online. Hello, and thank you for calling Maverick Staffing. We are excited to connect you with quality and qualified employers who seek top tier candidates for key company positions. Our main U S office is located at 120 Wall Street 31st Floor New York, NY 10005. We can be reached twenty four seven via email at support at staff maverick dot com. We are either assisting job seekers or employers. Your call has been noted and our general support representative will contact you at the earliest convenience following calls in the order of which they were received. We apologize for any inconvenience this causes and recommend you email us for quickest response time. Thank you for choosing Staff Maverick.
